theAncient:DefaultUncommonSkill.NAME: A Better Defend
theAncient:DefaultUncommonSkill.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Plated Armor. Affected by Dexterity.

theAncient:DefaultRareSkill.NAME: For Each Loop x2
theAncient:DefaultRareSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to all enemies, 2 times.
theAncient:DefaultRareSkill.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to all enemies, 3 times.

theAncient:DefaultRarePower.NAME: In-Progress Form
theAncient:DefaultRarePower.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, play a TOUCH.

theAncient:DefaultAttackWithVariable.NAME: Special Strike
theAncient:DefaultAttackWithVariable.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage [E] times. NL (Deal !theAncient:ENERGY_DAMAGE! damage total.)

theAncient:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSkill.NAME: Cool 2 Number Card
theAncient:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable and !theAncient:SecondMagic! poison to an enemy.

theAncient:Proclamation.NAME: Proclamation
theAncient:Proclamation.DESCRIPTION: Draw !theAncient:SecondMagic! cards. NL Gain !M! Prestige. NL Increase the Prestige of ALL Proclamation cards by 1 this combat.

theAncient:HumanShield.NAME: Human Shield
theAncient:HumanShield.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Plated Armor. NL Lose !theAncient:SecondMagic! Prestige.
